Topic: Draw a string telephone between two students.
Evidence Statements: The student can illustrate two students using a string telephone to communicate.
The student can show the string connecting two cups to demonstrate how sound travels.
The student can identify and label the source of sound (e.g., where a student speaks) and the receiver (e.g., where the other student listens).
The student can depict the string being pulled tight to represent how the device works effectively.
The student can label or illustrate the concept of sound traveling through the string.
The student can include features in the drawing that show how the device allows for communication over a distance.
